title: Inside the Tory election machine: who the key players are looking to mastermind a Boris election victory and the tactics they will use
text:
Boris Johnson's crack Conservative campaign squad has been waiting for an election for a while. Now Parliament has at last approved one, they will be working flat out to help their leader engineer a decisive Conservative victory.

Who are the key figures in the heart of the Conservative campaign machine and how will they hope to win? Read on to find out.

Isaac Levido

Mr Levido, a protege of Sir Lynton Crosby, has been working since August at Conservative Campaign Headquarters (CCHQ) as director of politics and campaigning.

Recently, he gave a presentation to the cabinet setting out the potential for the party to seize Leave-leaning Labour seats in the Midlands and the North, citing internal...
description: Boris Johnson's crack Conservative campaign squad has been waiting for an election for a while.
